Key.Original: A compatible grenade couldn't be found!
Key.English: A compatible grenade couldn't be found!

Key.Original: Someone threw a grenade into the hatch!!!
Key.English: Someone threw a grenade into the hatch!!!

Key.Original: Applies either ACE or Vanilla damage to crew.\nIf ACE is not loaded, it will not apply ACE damage.
Key.English: Applies either ACE or Vanilla damage to crew.\nIf ACE is not loaded, it will not apply ACE damage.

Key.Original: If ACE Medical is not loaded or the setting 'Damage Type' is set to 'Vanilla', this number will be chosen. Set to 0 for no damage.
Key.English: If ACE Medical is not loaded or the setting 'Damage Type' is set to 'Vanilla', this number will be chosen. Set to 0 for no damage.

Key.Original: Forces the crew to dismount, regardless of vehicle damage.
Key.English: Forces the crew to dismount, regardless of vehicle damage.

Key.Original: Maximum damage that can be dealt to vehicle's hull with multiple interactions.
Key.English: Maximum damage that can be dealt to vehicle's hull with multiple interactions.

Key.Original: Maximum damage that can be dealt to vehicle's engine with multiple interactions.
Key.English: Maximum damage that can be dealt to vehicle's engine with multiple interactions.

Key.Original: Maximum damage that can be dealt to vehicle's turret with multiple interactions.
Key.English: Maximum damage that can be dealt to vehicle's turret with multiple interactions.

Key.Original: The array of classnames of grenades that can be used.\nFormat is an array of strings.
Key.English: The array of classnames of grenades that can be used.\nFormat is an array of strings.

Key.Original: A blacklist for specific object types.\nFormat is an array of strings.
Key.English: A blacklist for specific object types.\nFormat is an array of strings.

Key.Original: A blacklist for an object and all of it's children.\nFormat is an array of strings.
Key.English: A blacklist for an object and all of it's children.\nFormat is an array of strings.

Key.Original: A whitelist for specific object types. If this is empty, it will be ignored.\nFormat is an array of strings.
Key.English: A whitelist for specific object types. If this is empty, it will be ignored.\nFormat is an array of strings.

Key.Original: A whitelist for an object and all of it's children. Use this to remove interaction from all object types.\nFormat is an array of strings.
Key.English: A whitelist for an object and all of it's children. Use this to remove interaction from all object types.\nFormat is an array of strings.

Key.Original: The array of allowed behavior types that the target crew must have in order to throw in a grenade. Default contains all behavior possibilities.\nFormat is an array of strings.
Key.English: The array of allowed behavior types that the target crew must have in order to throw in a grenade. Default contains all behavior possibilities.\nFormat is an array of strings.

Key.Original: Disable Player controlled Targets to be attacked
Key.English: Disable Player controlled Targets to be attacked

Key.Original: If a player is part of the target's crew, then disable the usage of this interaction.
Key.English: If a player is part of the target's crew, then disable the usage of this interaction.

Key.Original: Sets the delay of explosion after the explosive has been used.
Key.English: Sets the delay of explosion after the explosive has been used.

Key.Original: Sets the length of the interaction. It's the minimum if 'Enable Knowledge Multiplier' is enabled.
Key.English: Sets the length of the interaction. It's the minimum if 'Enable Knowledge Multiplier' is enabled.

Key.Original: Enables the setting below.\nIf the target 'knowsAbout' a unit, it will take longer according to the the result of 'knowsAbout'.
Key.English: Enables the setting below.\nIf the target 'knowsAbout' a unit, it will take longer according to the the result of 'knowsAbout'.

Key.Original: This will set the upper limit of the linear conversion.\nThe conversion is: [0, 4] -> [1, this setting].
Key.English: This will set the upper limit of the linear conversion.\nThe conversion is: [0, 4] -> [1, this setting].
